definition: having deserted a cause or principle, a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc., break with established customs
details:
adjective
- having deserted a cause or principle
= synonyms: recreant
noun
- a disloyal person who betrays or deserts his cause or religion or political party or friend etc.
= synonyms: ratter
- someone who rebels and becomes an outlaw
verb
- break with established customs
= synonyms: rebel
